name: I'm Not Santa!
description:
Small game created in Pico-8 for the Idle Thumbs Community Winter Wizard Jam. Created by Jon Decker and Ben Stryker. You play as a shitty wizard who just wants to drink his coffee in peace, but children keep mistaking him for Santa! Use the arrow keys to move and press 'Z' to temporarily turn small children into snowmen. Press ctrl+r to reset.

Pico-8 Forum page: http://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=2895
